kpi.name: M1006C262

kpi_info.title: RRC CONN RELEASE LTE REDIR DUE TO INACTIVITY
kpi_info.use: The number of RRC Connection Releases triggered by Smart LTE Layering feature because of inactivity or PS RAB release. Also M1006C24 is updated along with this counter. UPDATED: When the RNC sends RRC Connection Release message to the UE, triggered by Smart LTE Layering feature because of Cell_DCH to Cell_FACH/Cell_PCH/URA_PCH transition or Iu release. The counter is be updated only once per RRC Connection Release procedure, not counting repeated messages sent by the RNC.

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC CONN RELEASE LTE REDIR DUE TO INACTIVITY
